vclaim: Ahmad Al Aliwi Alissa, a man suspected of shooting and killing 10 people at a Colorado supermarket in March 2021, came to the U.S. as a Syrian refugee through asylum programs under former President Barack Obama.
title: Was Suspected Boulder Shooter a Syrian Refugee Who Came to US via Obama-Era Asylum Program?
subtitle: Shooting suspect Ahmad Al Aliwi Alissa allegedly shot and killed 10 people at a Colorado supermarket.
author: Nur Ibrahim
